author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St drops amid trade worries, Fed decision
text:
NEW YORK, May 2 (Reuters) - U.S. stocks dropped on Wednesday as investors remained concerned about worsening trade relations between the United States and China and digested the Federal Reserveâ€™s decision to leave interest rates unchanged.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 174.48 points, or 0.72 percent, to 23,924.57, the S&P 500 lost 19.17 points, or 0.72 percent, to 2,635.63 and the Nasdaq Composite dropped 29.81 points, or 0.42 percent, to 7,100.90. (Reporting by April Joyner Editing by James Dalgleish)
